name: Quinlin Alpha 3 Dec 2021
description:
Looking forward to hearing feedback

Control Details For Keyboard:

Arrow Keys to move

Q to scroll tools left

R to scroll tools right

W and D to toggle sidebars

A to interact

S to use tool

F to check objectives

Z to check tool tips, change direction without moving, sprint horse

X to jump

C to toggle tools and turn lanturn off and on

THE GAME WORKS WITH GAME CONTROLLERS (Tested On Xbox Controller)
